long_description: The lightweight REI Rainwall rain pants offer the full-featured, waterproof breathable protection that active girls need. She can keep them in her pack for sudden changes in the weather. Lightweight 2.5-layer ripstop nylon is waterproof, breathable and windproof to 60 mph; seams are sealed for complete protection. Elastic waistband and flat cordlock hem adjustment personalizes the fit. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion without tugging. Zippered openings on the lower legs allow easy on/off; adjustable cuffs cinch down securely over boots. Zippered hand pockets feature bonded flaps for protection from moisture.
short_description: The lightweight REI Rainwall rain pants offer the full-featured, waterproof breathable protection that active girls need. She can keep them in her pack for sudden changes in the weather.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
